profile.title: Xogta Isticmaalaha
profile.mustLogin: Waa inaad gasho si aad u aragto goobaha.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Muuji farriimaha asalka iyo kuwa la turjumay
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Ilbiriqsiyo ka hor inta aan si toos ah loo tirin
profile.avatarError: Khalad ayaa ka dhacay soo gelinta sawirka
profile.noPrivateKey: Qalabkan kuma jiro furaha gaarka ah ee la dhoofin karo.
profile.setBackupPassword: Deji eray sir ah si aad u qariso kaydkaaga:
profile.backupDownloaded: Kaydka la siray waa la soo dejiyay.
profile.importSuccess: Furaha gaarka ah waa lagu soo dhoofiyay qalabkan.
profile.importFailed: Furaha lama soo dhoofin (eray sir khaldan ama fayl xumaaday).
profile.keysRotated: Laba furayaal cusub ayaa la sameeyay oo furaha guud waa la diray.
profile.importKey: Soo dejinta kaydka la siray ee furaha
profile.keyDisclaimer: Furahaaga gaarka ah waligiis kama tago qalabkan. Dhoofiso nuqul sir ah si aad ugu soo celiso qalab kale.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Gudbi wicitaannada iyo fariimaha soo socda ee telefoonkaaga ama iimaylkaaga la xaqiijiyay. Wicitaannada/fariimaha soo baxa waxay muujin karaan lambarkaaga Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Dooro fariin ama qol si aad u bilowdo wada sheekeysi
